#!/bin/bash
PLUGINPATH="/Library/Internet Plug-Ins/DirectorShockwave.plugin"
# Plugin version S_VERSION=$( /usr/bin/defaults read "${PLUGINPATH}/Contents/Info" CFBundleShortVersionString 2>/dev/null )
if [[ -e "${PLUGINPATH}" ]]; then if [[ "${S_VERSION}" != "" ]]; then EA_RESULT="${S_VERSION}" fi else EA_RESULT="Not installed" fi
echo "<result>$SilverlightVersion</result>"
exit 0
